name: Cat Dungeon (itch)
description:
A game about the player, who is just stuck in a cave and needs to get out.
How will he get out tho?

Good thing we have a fire arm that shoots cats!

Bad thing that we have some foes in our way, the mice.

You need to find your way through the levels to reach the overworld light again.

Made in a week for a self made game jam by Robatortas for the Prolusio Interactive Company.

I will continue updating this project, so don't you worry, but this is what I managed to do in a week.

INSTRUCTIONS:

If you're on WINDOWS, run the program with the .exe file.

If you're on MAC or LINUX install java here https://www.java.com/en/download/ and run the jar file.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

SPACE to shoot

UP & DOWN KEYS to aim

DISCLAIMER:

This game is not for the faint of heart, it contains huge amounts of gore and cruelty in a satire way but still, if you feel uncomfortable playing this, close it. I know it's not for everyone.
